normalised: Konkani-nt kedna India-nt kitle vaztat mhunn konnem tori mhojhe kodden vicharlem, tedna donparchea dha vorancho E-S-T asat. Dekhun, India I-S-T follow korta, je Indian Standard Time, ani tem G-M-T plus paanch tees. Mhanntlear tem Greenwich Mean Time-chea paanch ani adhea voram fuddem asa. Atam, E-S-T mhanntlear Eastern Standard Time, ani tem sadharanponnan G-M-T minus paanch asta, punn daylight saving vellar, tem G-M-T minus char asta. Dekhun difference sodyo korpak thodi calculation zai, kitem mhunn sang?

unnormalised: Konnen tor mhaka India-nt kitlo vell zala mhunn vicharlem, tedna EST sokallchea 10 vazlele asle. Tori India IST follow korta, mhonnge Indian Standard Time, ani tem GMT+5:30. Mhonnche Greenwich Mean Time-a portun 5 ani adhi horam fuddlean asta. Atam, EST mhonnge Eastern Standard Time, ani tem sadharanponnan GMT-5 asta, punn uzvaddak samballunk, tem GMT-4 zata. Mhonnche, kitlo forok asa tem sodunk thodi calculation korunk podta, tum zannay?
normalised: Chal, daylight savings naka mhunn dhortam, tem sope korpak. Zonn donparchea dha vorancho E-S-T (G-M-T minus paanch) asat, tor G-M-T donparchea teen voranchi. India G-M-T plus paanch tees asun, titlo difference zodo. Dekhun, donparchea teen voram plus paanch voram tees minute mhanntlear rati aatth voram tees minute I-S-T zatat. Dhyaan dovort march te november-ant, daylight savings-ak lagun difference khatin zaunk xakta. Sadaiv double check kor, bhai!

unnormalised: Diva uzvaddacho samball naslo mhunn dharun gheuya, fokot them sompem korunk. Zori EST sokallchea 10:00 vazle (GMT-5), zalear GMT mhonnge dupara 3:00 vazta. India GMT+5:30 astana, fokot to forok mellounk zai. Mhonnche, dupara 3:00 vazta + 5 horam 30 mintam mhonnge rati 8:30 PM IST zata. Monant dovortat March te November-achea kallant, daylight savings-ak lagun forok adkholichem zaunk xokta. Sodanch double check korat, bhai!
normalised: Dekhun, sankshepant sangpak, zonn donparchea dha vorancho E-S-T atam asa ani daylight savings effect-ant na, tor team vellar India-nt rati aatth voram tees minute zatole. Punn sadaiv Google-ant 'time in India' sodun pollounk chodd borem, ani tech zannvechea, khas korun march-november-ant! Mhaka aasha asa tem thodem sopeponn zatolem!

unnormalised: Mhonnche, tunken uktear, zori atam sokallchea 10 AM EST zale ani daylight savings asonam, zalear India-nt choddkorun rati 8:30 PM zatle. Punn sodanch ek bori idea 'time in India' mhunn Google-ar topasun gheunk, 100% tharavik zaunk, khas korun March-Novemberache modheant! Mhaka umeed asa hanen thodde vostu spostaun sanglya mhunn!
